prompt:
Generate surface form variations for entity matching.

TERM: stereo madness\nCONTEXT: how to beat without stereo madness

GENERATE:
- Case variations (lowercase, uppercase, title case)
- Plural/singular forms
- Common abbreviations
- Synonyms referring to the same concept
- Common misspellings (if any)

OUTPUT FORMAT (JSON):
{
  "term": "stereo madness",
  "variations": ["variation1", "variation2", ...],
  "synonyms": ["synonym1", "synonym2", ...],
  "abbreviations": ["abbr1", ...]
}

Provide ONLY the JSON output.
response:
{
  "term": "stereo madness",
  "variations": [
    "stereo madness",
    "Stereo Madness",
    "STEREO MADNESS",
    "Stereo madness",
    "stereo Madness",
    "stereo-madness",
    "Stereo-Madness",
    "stereomadness",
    "StereoMadness",
    "stereo  madness",
    "stereo madnesses"
  ],
  "synonyms": [
    "Geometry Dash Stereo Madness",
    "Stereo Madness level",
    "Stereo Madness (Geometry Dash)",
    "Stereo Madness (GD)",
    "Stereo Madness (level 1)",
    "first level Stereo Madness",
    "GD Stereo Madness"
  ],
  "abbreviations": [
    "SM",
    "GD SM"
  ]
}
